pkgmetadata.longdescription: Addons for the 'mclust' Package // Extend the functionality of the 'mclust' package for Gaussian finite mixture modelling by including: density estimation for data with bounded support (Scrucca, 2019 doi:10.1002/bimj.201800174); modal clustering using MEM algorithm for Gaussian mixtures (Scrucca, 2021 doi:10.1002/sam.11527).
